org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore

Class TransactionalMetaStoreEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.MetaStoreEventListener
      • org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.TransactionalMetaStoreEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DbNotificationListener

    public abstract class TransactionalMetaStoreEventListener
extends MetaStoreEventListener
    Special type of MetaStoreEventListener which should only be called in a transactional context and only if the transaction is successful. The events are expected to have a success status.
